basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period time
basic.color: Leaf color green，flower color light yellow

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sunlight, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought，water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
